name: Finding Anastasia
description:
GAME DESCRIPTION:


You receive an email from an ex-girlfriend.
From which you will learn that your parting was set up and the girl herself was kidnapped.
At the same moment you go in search of your beloved. Ahead of you are waiting for a lot of mysteries and mysticism.



The game is a detective horror thriller with a first-person view, standard controls and a deep storyline.

GAME FEATURES:

  • Two endings.
  • Open world.
  • Responsive controls.
  • Beautiful graphics.
  • Good optimization.
  • Tense atmosphere.
